Package org.drip.state.identifier

Class FXLabel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.state.identifier.FXLabel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LatentStateLabel
    public class FXLabel
extends java.lang.Object
implements LatentStateLabel
    FXLabel contains the Identifier Parameters referencing the Latent State of the named FX Curve. Currently it only contains the FX Code.

    • Module = Analytics Core Module
    • Library = Fixed Income Analytics Library
    • Project = State
    • Package = Identifier


    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
